# W0127-22G428 Lease of Portable VHF Radio Sets

## Tender Details

- **Tender Reference Number**: WS3599640117
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Publication Date**: 2022-09-07
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-07T14:00:00 (CDT)

## Proposal Requirements

AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-10-07 at 2:00PM (CDT). Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a short-term lease of portable VHF radio sets. The equipment must be interoperable in a non-secure mode with other military-specific radios in the same frequency band, as per the technical requirements.

### Lease Terms

- **Lease Period**: Two (2) years
- **Option Periods**: Three (3) additional years of one (1) year each, with the option to extend

### Requirements and Evaluation

- **80% Canadian Origin**: Bids must consist of no less than 80% of goods and/or services of Canadian origin.
- **Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria**: Include in Annex "B" of the solicitation.
- **Contractor Selection**: Bids must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

- **Lowest Price**: The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
